title: Himitsu na Kimi ni Koi wo Shita
original_name: ヒミツなキミに恋をした
sinopse:
Shizuka Naoto doesn't have the intention to be the main actress. Everyone was so weird. Then a boy caught her attention... And together they started regularly feeding a wild cat. But what will happen to them...?

(Source: Chibi Manga)
